sentences.en: But I have never categorically stated I want to play abroad.
sentences.cn: 但是我从没认真想过我会在海外踢球.

sentences.en: Can you state categorically that her death was caused by lack of food?
sentences.cn: 你能明确地说她是饿死的吗？

sentences.en: He answered the other side's questions categorically.
sentences.cn: 他斩钉截铁地回答对方的问题.

sentences.en: He has categorically denied being involved in the fraud.
sentences.cn: 他断然否认自己涉及这项诈骗.

sentences.en: He stated categorically that he was not at the scene of the crime.
sentences.cn: 他一口咬定当时不在现场.

sentences.en: I asked her several times to come but she categorically refused.
sentences.cn: 我三番五次请她来,她都断然拒绝了.

sentences.en: I can categorically deny any sort of negotiations with the Giallorossi for Peruzzi.
sentences.cn: 我将无条件的否决关于罗马和佩鲁济的任何谈判.

sentences.en: The man categorically denied that he was guilty.
The Rydalian Foreign Ministry categorically dismissed these complaints.
sentences.cn: 赖尔德外交部门大都驳回了这些申诉.

sentences.en: They totally and categorically deny the charges.
sentences.cn: 他们彻底而又坚决地否认了那些指控。

sentences.en: This thesis studies the translation of Chinese Tourist Guidance mainly through a categorically analytic approach.
sentences.cn: 本文主要运用分类分析的方法研究导游词翻译的问题.

sentences.en: We categorically reject this groundless charge.
sentences.cn: 我们断然否认这种无理指责.
